channel.description: for i in range(3): for j in range(5): print("* ", end="") print("") * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * for i in range(5): for j in range(i + 1): print("* ", end="") print("") * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * for i in range(5): for j in range(4 - i): print(" ", end="") for j in range(i + 1): print("
